title: computer crash
body: my moms laptop crashed during a game i was in i had to reboot n try to relog in but by the time i got into the client the game was over n ive been charged with afk lower priority que..anyway we can get it off? wasnt my fault the crashed happened plz and ty.

replies.body: We're unable to remove leaverbuster penalties or change game stats.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty would only happen after more than 1 game and with a consistent history of leaving.  Leaving does cause others a negative experience so the system will treat all leaves equally.  Let me know if that clears things up!
